message: I submitted this to HN a few days and got some constructive feedback. i want to know if it okay now. You can use access code: BETATESTER to sign up at poplytics.com. It is a customer feedback tool for websites.
@sammville Would you like to be featured on StartupLi.st? You could even make a startuplist invite code! :)
looks like the kissinsights app, and tehre was recently popfeedback, but both were paid, yours seems to be free?
@nickfrost sure would love to. Wld contact you!
@samville - you work on something else, right?
@rasiel yeah i wanted to build one without the annoying pop up
@geoffw8 i don't understand what you mean
@nickfrost not to spam someone elses thread, but I'm part of a startup preparing to launch in a week or so. Could I get more info about StartupLi.st?
for example the spinning ajax loader has a black background, while the modal has a dark blue

I'm not a big fan of the visual design of the feedback box, the animation is a bit jarring and the "Powered by Poplytics" is larger sized and more prevalent than the actual feedback question and the colors could use some work
serif typeface in the feedback modal looks unfinished
@dmix and @snsr i would put some work into it. Thanks guys
how does it stand out from the other similar services in the space?
I would use some graphics on the landing page, too much text, not much to illustrate
@samer: I am presently working on a new landing page. Thanks for that. You can try it out using the code: BETATESTER

@Aussiewebmaster: It uses a tab at the bottom of the page to ask a question and is not obtrusive. I really did not like pop-up panels from the other services. I plan to make it more affordable (presently free). It also uses graphical representation and gives a count of other data such as platform, browser and country
